mapper.select: SELECT c.role_id, d.metadata_id, g.target_table_name, g.filed_name, g.filed_type, e.relation, e.value_type, e.filed_value FROM dp_role_permission_relation c LEFT JOIN dp_permission d ON c.permission_id = d.id LEFT JOIN dp_permission_metadata f ON d.metadata_id = f.id LEFT JOIN dp_permission_item e ON e.permission_id = d.id LEFT JOIN dp_permission_item_metadata g on e.metadata_id= g.id WHERE f.operation_identifier = #{operationIdentifier} and c.role_id IN ( SELECT a.role_id FROM dp_role_user a WHERE a.sub_system_code = #{subsystem} AND a.user_id = #{userId} )
